LogEntry.description: Represents a captured log entry with structured metadata.

timestamp.description: Time the log entry was captured.

correlationId.description: Correlation identifier associated with the log entry.

exception.description: Optional exception for the log entry.

LogLevel.description: Defines severity levels for application logging.

codeBase.x-deprecatedMessage: Assembly.CodeBase and Assembly.EscapedCodeBase are only included for .NET Framework compatibility. Use Assembly.Location.

escapedCodeBase.x-deprecatedMessage: Assembly.CodeBase and Assembly.EscapedCodeBase are only included for .NET Framework compatibility. Use Assembly.Location.

globalAssemblyCache.x-deprecatedMessage: The Global Assembly Cache is not supported.

isNotSerialized.x-deprecatedMessage: Formatter-based serialization is obsolete and should not be used.

JWT.description: Type into the textbox: Bearer {your JWT token}.
JWT.name: Authorization
